an4.169:1.1: “Mendicants, these four individuals are found in the world.
an4.169:1.3: One individual is fully extinguished in this very life by making extra effort.
an4.169:1.4: One individual is fully extinguished when the body breaks up by making extra effort.
an4.169:1.5: One individual is fully extinguished in this very life without making extra effort.
an4.169:1.6: One individual is fully extinguished when the body breaks up without making extra effort.
an4.169:2.1: And how is an individual fully extinguished in this very life by making extra effort?
an4.169:2.2: It’s when a mendicant meditates observing the ugliness of the body, perceives the repulsiveness of food, perceives dissatisfaction with the whole world, observes the impermanence of all conditions,
an4.169:2.3: and has well established the perception of their own death.
an4.169:2.4: They rely on these five powers of a trainee:
an4.169:2.5: faith, conscience, prudence, energy, and wisdom.
an4.169:2.6: And these five faculties manifest in them strongly:
an4.169:2.7: faith, energy, mindfulness, immersion, and wisdom.
an4.169:2.8: Because of the strength of the five faculties, they are fully extinguished in this very life by making extra effort.
an4.169:2.9: That’s how an individual is fully extinguished in this very life by making extra effort.
an4.169:3.1: How is an individual fully extinguished when the body breaks up by making extra effort?
an4.169:3.2: It’s when a mendicant meditates observing the ugliness of the body, perceives the repulsiveness of food, perceives dissatisfaction with the whole world, observes the impermanence of all conditions,
an4.169:3.3: and has well established the perception of their own death.
an4.169:3.4: They rely on these five powers of a trainee:
an4.169:3.5: faith, conscience, prudence, energy, and wisdom.
an4.169:3.6: But these five faculties manifest in them weakly:
an4.169:3.7: faith, energy, mindfulness, immersion, and wisdom.
an4.169:3.8: Because of the weakness of the five faculties, they are fully extinguished when the body breaks up by making extra effort.
an4.169:3.9: That’s how an individual is fully extinguished when the body breaks up by making extra effort.
an4.169:4.1: And how is an individual fully extinguished in this very life without making extra effort?
an4.169:4.2: It’s when a mendicant … enters and remains in the first absorption … second absorption … third absorption … fourth absorption …
an4.169:4.3: They rely on these five powers of a trainee:
an4.169:4.4: faith, conscience, prudence, energy, and wisdom.
an4.169:4.5: And these five faculties manifest in them strongly:
an4.169:4.6: faith, energy, mindfulness, immersion, and wisdom.
an4.169:4.7: Because of the strength of the five faculties, they are fully extinguished in this very life without making extra effort.
an4.169:4.8: That’s how an individual is fully extinguished in this very life without making extra effort.
an4.169:5.1: And how is an individual fully extinguished when the body breaks up without making extra effort?
an4.169:5.2: It’s when a mendicant … enters and remains in the first absorption … second absorption … third absorption … fourth absorption …
an4.169:5.3: They rely on these five powers of a trainee:
an4.169:5.4: faith, conscience, prudence, energy, and wisdom.
an4.169:5.5: But these five faculties manifest in them weakly: faith, energy, mindfulness, immersion, and wisdom.
an4.169:5.6: Because of the weakness of the five faculties, they are fully extinguished when the body breaks up without making extra effort.
an4.169:5.7: That’s how an individual is fully extinguished when the body breaks up without making extra effort.
an4.169:5.8: These are the four individuals found in the world.”
